Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class TcpClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.TcpClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client
public class TcpClient extends Object implements Client
This class represents a client that uses the tcp connection protocol
